weka.dl4j

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.dl4j.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility routines for the Dl4jMlpClassifier.

      static java.lang.String getAttributeName(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> attributesPerLayer, int i)
      Helper function for getting the new layer name when using the Dl4jMlpFilter The attributes are named after the layer they originated from, so this function counts throught the attributes per layer, comparing it with the given index to determine a) which layer the activation came from and b) which number activation this is.

      Access private field of a given object.

      Fix for issue with JVM crashing https://github.com/eclipse/deeplearning4j/issues/8976#issuecomment-639946904 It is recommended to use this helper function in WekaDeeplearning4j rather than using iter.next() directly.

    • Method Detail

      • instancesToDataSet

        public static org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.DataSet instancesToDataSet(weka.core.Instances insts)
        Converts a set of training instances to a DataSet. Assumes that the instances have been suitably preprocessed - i.e. missing values replaced and nominals converted to binary/numeric. Also assumes that the class index has been set
        Parameters:
        insts - the instances to convert
        Returns:
        a DataSet

      • instancesToConvDataSet

        public static org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.DataSet instancesToConvDataSet(weka.core.Instances insts,
                                                                     int height,
                                                                     int width,
                                                                     int channels)
        Converts a set of training instances to a DataSet prepared for the convolution operation using the height, width and number of channels.
        Parameters:
        height - image height
        width - image width
        channels - number of image channels
        insts - the instances to convert
        Returns:
        a DataSet

                                  org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.api.iterator.DataSetIterator iter)
        Compute the model score on a given iterator.
        Parameters:
        model - Model
        iter - Iterator
        Returns:
        Model score on iterator data

      • copyNominalAttribute

        public static weka.core.Attribute copyNominalAttribute(weka.core.Attribute oldAttribute)
        Copies the attribute name and values of a given nominal attribute.
        Parameters:
        oldAttribute - attribute to copy
        Returns:
        duplicated nominal attribute

      • getAttributeName

        public static java.lang.String getAttributeName(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> attributesPerLayer,
                                                int i)
        Helper function for getting the new layer name when using the Dl4jMlpFilter The attributes are named after the layer they originated from, so this function counts throught the attributes per layer, comparing it with the given index to determine a) which layer the activation came from and b) which number activation this is.
        Parameters:
        attributesPerLayer - Hashmap defining how many attributes there are per layer
        i - Index of layer we're currently looking at.
        Returns:
        Attribute name for transformed attribute.

      • ndArrayToInstances

        public static weka.core.Instances ndArrayToInstances(org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray ndArray,
                                                     weka.core.Instances inputFormat,
                                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> attributesPerLayer)
                                              throws weka.core.WekaException
        Convert an arbitrary NDArray to Weka instances.
        Parameters:
        ndArray - Input array
        inputFormat - Format to use for the instances
        attributesPerLayer - Hashmap of layer names and how many attributes there are per layer
        Returns:
        Instances object
        Throws:
        weka.core.WekaException - Invalid input

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • isChannelsLast

        public static boolean isChannelsLast(org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray activations)
        Shape will either be something like [1, 56, 56, 128] or [1, 128, 56, 56] If it's the former then return true.
        Parameters:
        activations -
        Returns:
        true if the activations are in channels-last format

      • reshapeActivations

        public static org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray reshapeActivations(org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray activationAtLayer,
                                                                      PoolingType poolingType)
        Reshape the activations, either by pooling or simply multiplying the extra dimensions together.
        Parameters:
        activationAtLayer - 4d activations e.g., [batch_size, 512, 64, 64]
        poolingType - Pooling type to use to lower the dimensionality
        Returns:
        2D activations

      • appendClasses

        public static org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray appendClasses(org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray result,
                                                                 weka.core.Instances input)
        Appends the input Instances classes to the INDArray.
        Parameters:
        result - activations
        input - original Instances
        Returns:
        activations with class value appended

      • convertToInstances

        public static weka.core.Instances convertToInstances(org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray result,
                                                     weka.core.Instances input,
                                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> attributesPerLayer)
                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Converts the newly transformed instances to an Instances object.
        Parameters:
        result - activations generated from feature layers
        input - original input Instances
        attributesPerLayer - Hashmap stating the feature layers and how many attributes each has
        Returns:
        Instances
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - File exception

      • getNext

        public static org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.DataSet getNext(org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.api.iterator.DataSetIterator iter)
        Fix for issue with JVM crashing https://github.com/eclipse/deeplearning4j/issues/8976#issuecomment-639946904 It is recommended to use this helper function in WekaDeeplearning4j rather than using iter.next() directly.
        Parameters:
        iter - DatasetIterator to get images from
        Returns:
        Next DataSet

      • getNext

        public static org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.DataSet getNext(org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.api.iterator.DataSetIterator iter,
                                                      int num)
        Fix for issue with JVM crashing https://github.com/eclipse/deeplearning4j/issues/8976#issuecomment-639946904 It is recommended to use this helper function in WekaDeeplearning4j rather than using iter.next() directly.
        Parameters:
        iter - DatasetIterator to get images from
        num - Batch size to get
        Returns:
        Next DataSet

        Returns:
